channel.title: As Bolts Stack the model changes?
channel.description:
Alright so i was looking on my server and saw as a i had 1 bolt in inv it showed 1 bolt, then i added a second and the inv model/item turned to "2" bolts. and then when i added a third, it showed 3 bolts?
Now i wanna do the same thing with purple sweets. start of with 1 and it shows 1 purple, then 2 and it shows 2. i have the models from rsmv cache. i just don't know what code to place for this any help??
btw i tryed searching for the bolt code but i couldnt find anything. :/

item.title: As Bolts Stack the model changes?
item.dc:creator: @Michaelmmm Michaelmmm
item.description:
@Michaelmmm wrote:

i can make them stackable thats not the problem. i’m saying i want the inv model to change as they grow, theres maybe 5 models of sweets? such as:

1 sweet, is 1 sweet in inv
2 sweet is 2 sweet in inv
3 sweet is 3 sweet in inv
4 sweet is 4 sweet in inv
5 sweet is a stack of sweets
6 sweet is a pile of sweets
and from then on it says the 6 model ( the pile of sweets)

the question is how can i change it so as they add up the inv picture changes?

Read full topic
item.source: As Bolts Stack the model changes?

item.title: As Bolts Stack the model changes?
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Are the purple sweets defined as stackable in your item class?

Read full topic
